content: 31:16 Yes, and Kathryn, not to be evasive here, it really has been broad-based as we talked about earlier in the Q&A session of this call, the Waterworks performance at fifty percent growth has been very strong, aided in large part by some commodity inflation in that business, but really across the board from residential trade plumbing through our building remodel business, our digital commerce business with that light decorative pro and project-minded consumer through HVAC and into that non-res space as well within industrial, commercial mechanical.
